update t_au_user
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_MD5_PWD = #{userMd5Pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PWD = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LAST_LOGIN_IP = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_au_user set LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_MD5_PWD = #{userMd5Pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PWD = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_LOGIN_IP = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=BIT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PICTURE_ID = #{userPictureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from T_AU_USER WHERE IS_DELETED = 0
AND LOGIN_NAME LIKE "%"#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"

SELECT COUNT(1) AS TOTAL from T_AU_USER WHERE IS_DELETED = 0
AND LOGIN_NAME LIKE "%"#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
